description: Based on the fourth-generation block chain technology, PVB distributed block chain platform -- PVB gold data digital integral trading ecosystem is built.

overview.en: Based on the fourth-generation block chain technology, PVB distributed block chain platform -- PVB gold data digital integral trading ecosystem is built.
overview.zh: 基于第四代区块链技术搭建了PVB分布式区块链平台——PVB黄金数据的数字积分交易生态系统。
